scripts.dev-wrangler: pnpm run build && cp .dev.vars .mastra/output && wrangler dev --remote --config .mastra/output/wrangler.json
scripts.deploy-preview: cd .mastra/output && wrangler versions upload --tag $(git rev-parse --short HEAD) --preview-alias ${WORKERS_CI_BRANCH:-$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)}
